title: Deluxe Double Room
description: This spacious room features a comfortable king-sized bed, a work desk, and a seating area with a sofa. The room also has a private balcony with views of the city.

title: Superior Suite
description: This luxurious suite features a separate living room and bedroom, a king-sized bed, a work desk, and a private balcony with stunning views of the ocean. The suite also includes a Jacuzzi tub in the bathroom.

title: Standard Room
description: This cozy room features a comfortable queen-sized bed, a work desk, and a private bathroom. The room also includes a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.
